entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. Your call may be recorded for quality assurance. Please wait while I connect you with an agent.
Thank you for calling VeloFit, this is Alex speaking. How can I assist you today?
Hi Alex, I recently received a bike from you, and unfortunately, it arrived damaged. I think there was some shipping damage.
I'm so sorry to hear that your bike arrived damaged! Can you describe the damage for me?

Well, the main thing is the frame. It looks like it has a cracked frame near the handlebars. Also, the front wheel seems wobbly. I’m really disappointed because I was looking forward to riding it this weekend.

Oh dear, a cracked frame and wobbly wheel! That's definitely not what we want our customers to experience. I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and frustration this has caused. Let's get this resolved for you right away.

Because of the extent of the damage, and especially that cracked frame, I'm going to issue a full refund for the bike. Also, we definitely want the damaged bike back, so I’ll email you a free label so you can easily ship the bike back to us at no cost to you.
Really? A full refund and a free label? That's fantastic! That's really all I was hoping for.

Absolutely! You'll receive the refund within 5-7 business days. The email with the free label should arrive within the next hour. Just repackage the bike in its original box, if possible, and drop it off at any authorized carrier location. The email will have all the instructions.
Wonderful, thank you so much for your help, Alex! I really appreciate it.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business and hope you'll consider VeloFit again in the future. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
